clinical_study.brief_title: To Identify KRAS Gene and Safe Margin in Association With Outcome in Colorectal Liver Metastases Following Ultrasound-guided Radiofrequency Ablation
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Study to Identify KRAS Gene and Safe Margin in Association With Outcome in Colorectal Liver Metastases Following Ultrasound-guided Radiofrequency Ablation

brief_summary.textblock: To investigate the clinical effect of radiofrequency ablation on colorectal cancer liver metastases with different KRAS gene status

primary_outcome.description: the appearance of tumor foci at the edge of the ablation zones after at least one contrast-enhanced follow-up study has documented adequate ablation and covered by the ablation zone in the target tumor and surrounding ablation margin using imaging criteria

intervention.description: Both groups of patients underwent radiofrequency ablation

study_pop.textblock: Men or women 18 years of age or older
